attributes.action: create a N.S.E (National Service education) lesson for high schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With wars across the world becoming frequent we need to atract more people to the army and of course we cant force people into the army its against human rights, so why not teach our youths the basic in school from types of jobs in the army, aid work, to phisical army training (schools could build climbing frame structures ect for this), this could be a lesson taught once a week whith diferent things like a rotar. This could also offer day trips to army bases ect, intergrate ethnic minorities into the army, inspire youth to join, and give them basic traing and knowledge of the army and what it has to offer. *If room was need to make space for this lesson, music and drama could be put together into a performing arts lesson.
